scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const root=process.cwd(); const db=path.join(root,'db.json'); if(fs.existsSync(db)) fs.rmSync(db,{force:true}); const pub=path.join(root,'public'); if(fs.existsSync(pub)){ for(const name of fs.readdirSync(pub)){ if(name==='.git') continue; fs.rmSync(path.join(pub,name),{recursive:true,force:true}); } }"
scripts.deploy: npm run publish && git -C public add . && git -C public commit -m "deploy" && git -C public push
